executiveSummary: Dinesh Taripali, co-founder of Incredible Eats, pitched his edible cutlery company to the Sharks, seeking $500,000 for 7% equity. After discussions on cost, scalability, and market strategy, Lori Greiner ultimately invested $500,000 for 15% equity, securing a deal.
keyDecisions: Lori Greiner agreed to invest $500,000 for 15% equity in Incredible Eats.

actionItems.task: Scale production and reduce per-unit cost of edible cutlery from 20 cents to 15 cents or lower.
Develop retail packaging and marketing materials to emphasize the product’s edible and eco-friendly nature.
Expand distribution to both food service and grocery retail channels with Lori Greiner’s guidance.

nextSteps: Dinesh and Lori will collaborate to scale production, refine product marketing, and expand into retail and food service markets while leveraging Lori’s business network for growth.
